game.name: Kuro survival
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In the game, we live as Kuro's life, a young ninja got a bad situation in the forest of monster. Kuro have to fight against a ton of monster to stay alive. With blade and shurikens, Kuro hope that he can come back to home soon. Together, help Kuro reunite with his waifu.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the game, we live as Kuro's life, a young ninja got a bad situation in the forest of monster. Kuro have to fight against a ton of monster to stay alive. With blade and shurikens, Kuro hope that he can come back to home soon. Together, help Kuro reunite with his waifu.

reviewHighlights.text: Game’s fine I guess, but my ex used the same soundtrack for her TikToks so every time I hear it, I feel emotional damage. I’m not surviving anything,...
I don’t care how good the game is, my cat walked on my keyboard right when I was being chased and now she’s the real final boss. I lost all progress a...
